about_the_game:
[Please read it Before you buy it!][Game Guide]


In the absurd doomsday world, people only seek one dream, that is no longer worrying about your survival... How lucky! You stumbled into an apartment ,which must be the utopia in everyone’s dreams!

This is Hunger Apartment, a place not only feeding you and warming you, but also satisfying even your most insane fantasies.
No more hunger, no more displacement

But don’t worry, the price is quite affordable, just your delicious humanity in total.

However, when you start to find those ugly conspiracies，and reveal those despicable lies，will this still be your dream？ or your destination？Will it make you surrender your ownhumanity？

Will you choose to sort out your minds in a disorder and see the truth in the dark
Or continue dreaming in a doze and spend the rest of your life in fake peace?

Will you choose to stay awake in chaos and struggle in Samsara
Or drift along with the lies and abandon yourself in madness?

We tell you everything in a wordlessway, will you be able to understand the intricate Karma？

In the world of Hunger Apartment

“Sense”


Two distinct characters
Can you tell their different meanings behind?

"They "


Unconcerned eyes everywhere
Can you take a breath to catch the truth?

"Conspiracies "


Behind the silence
Will there be a sparkle to lighten the dark?

"Choices"


Say you won’t give up
And hear your as well as my stories.

------------------------------------------------------------------

Hush!
Walk in, and find yourshelter
Live, and find the last light
...

Update log

Version：1.2.385

2.0 Fix Ui Guide missing bugs
3.0 Fix some bugs when you open the bag
4.0 Fix“Butcher in tools Room shows wrong QE tips”
5.0 Fix aromas bugs

Version:1.2.360

1.UI signature in the ED bug fix

2.UI logic error when butcher in the tools room fix

Version:1.2.338
1.0 sound Ajustment bug fix
2.0 Tutorial Added
3.0 Bug Fix(Floor hands function Fix / floor 3 )
4.0 more clues in 403

21/3/2019 v1.1
1.Difficulty Fix “More easier when butcher chasing you”
2.Difficulty Fix “Butcher will not serching small hinding place usually”
3. One more easter egg
4.Fix Animation “strange door”
5.Fix Animation “character special move in 402”


About this game


Hi there, this is the development team of Hunger Apartment, a 2D horror decryption game.

This is our first issued game, and we choose a different way of telling stories.

We try to create a unique experience without using any words, and let players conceive their own stories.

There could be different and open explanations and understandings for different person.

The game is still in EA, and we will keep on perfecting it to let it finish its story.

As storytellers, we would like to thank everyone who listens to the story quietly.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or more
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or more
  • Processor: Core i5 – 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S, 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

name: Hunger Apartment （蚀狱）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600M / ATI Radeon HD 5450 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 (1Gb) / Radeon R7 A10-7700K
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews:
“To be honest, this game might need continuous polish, yet its unique way of expressing things without words has really surprised us!”
7.0 – CCTSI

“Perhaps just like the name of the game, it wants to show not only a simple "appetite" or an extension of "greed", but perhaps more meaningful things.”
7.3 – BlackBox

“There are too many things still hidden behind the game, but I can’t wait the day it is accomplished and so be my inner puzzle.”
7.1 – Anthony Jones
short_description: This is Hunger Apartment, a place feeding you, warming you, and satisfying all your fantasies.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Thai*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
